title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: Slightly warp-faced plain weave (16/cm x 14/cm) and slit tapestry
description: Half circle. Dark purple, red and yellow wool pattern on undyed linen ground. Probably was a full circular roundel.  A red vase flanked by two birds and vine leaves.  The tapestry area has warp groupings of 3+2.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment.
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, S-spun wool
Technique: Slightly warp-faced plain weave (16/cm x 14/cm) and slit tapestry. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-506.
